main.name: Usi Chukwuedu Project
main.description: I am a Professional UI/UX Designer
main.bio: I am a UI/UX Designer/ Web Developer with a demonstrated skill of producing quality and user-friendly designs. I have contribute to the development, release and maintenance of websites and applications for maximum growth. I’m experienced working with teams to produce impactful, leading-edge websites that engage customers and deliver business results. Well-versed in design standards and user preferences.

education.degree: Masters in Automated System Information, Processing and Control
education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: UI/UX DESIGNER AND WEB DEVELOPER
work.description: Designed responsive themes using Bootstrap, HTML/XHTML, CSS. • Implemented AJAX, XML and JQuery on Front-End to make the web page more dynamic. • Developed dynamic websites and dashboards compatible with multiple browsers using Javascript, Ajax, XML, React, Laravel and other applications. • Implement pixel-perfect websites from wireframes. • Designed Responsive Web applications using WordPress • Created unique spaces for marketing ads within landing pages thereby increasing visitor conversion rates. • Took concepts and produced design mockups and prototypes to strengthen designs, enhance user experiences and improve site interactions. • Conducted unit testing to deliver optimal browser functionality. • Used PHP and MySQL in creating admin automated tools which makes easy add, update, delete of content. • Conceived and designed database tables in MYSQL • Worked in Agile based environment with daily scrum calls and coordination with the offshore team.

work.title: UI/UX DESIGNER AND WEB DEVELOPER
work.description: Developed new user-facing features. • Built reusable code and libraries for future use. • Ensured the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. • Optimized application for maximum speed and scalabilty. • Assured that all user inputs were validated before submitting to back-end. • Collaborated with other team members and stakeholders.
